org.springframework.test.web.servlet.result

类 FlashAttributeResultMatchers

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.test.web.servlet.result.FlashAttributeResultMatchers

  • public class FlashAttributeResultMatchers
extends java.lang.Object
    Factory for "output" flash attribute assertions.

    An instance of this class is typically accessed via MockMvcResultMatchers.flash().

    从以下版本开始:
    3.2
    作者:
    Rossen Stoyanchev

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      限定符 构造器和说明
      protected FlashAttributeResultMatchers()
      Protected constructor.

      Assert a flash attribute's value with the given Hamcrest Matcher.
      <T> ResultMatcher attribute(java.lang.String name, java.lang.Object value)
      Assert a flash attribute's value.
      <T> ResultMatcher attributeCount(int count)
      Assert the number of flash attributes.
      <T> ResultMatcher attributeExists(java.lang.String... names)
      Assert the existence of the given flash attributes.
